basic.name: Radiant Dash (Q)
basic.description: Jump to an allied or enemy unit. Enemies are immediately hit with a Basic Attack.Stores up to 2 charges.

basic.name: Breath of Heaven (W)
basic.description: Heal nearby Heroes for 285 and give them 15% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

basic.name: Deadly Reach (E)
basic.description: Kharazim's next Basic Attack increases his Attack Speed and Attack Range by 100% for 2 seconds.

heroic.name: Divine Palm (R)
heroic.description: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1200 if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

heroic.name: Seven-Sided Strike (R)
heroic.description: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 2 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

trait.name: Pick Your Trait (T)
trait.description: Choose between Transcendence, Iron Fists, and Insight from the Talents panel.

1.name: Transcendence
1.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals the lowest nearby allied Hero for 104 and gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2.5 seconds.

1.name: Iron Fists
1.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 110% bonus damage and gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2.5 seconds.

1.name: Insight
1.description: Quest: Every 3rd Basic Attack restores 14 Mana, grants a stack of Insight, and gives 25% increased Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds.Reward: Upon getting 100 stacks of Insight, every 3rd attack also reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 1.75 seconds.

4.name: Spirit Ally
4.description: Place a Spirit Ally that heals allied Heroes in a large area around it for 2% of their maximum Health every second. Has 150 Health and lasts 10 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Spirit Allies.

4.name: Earth Ally
4.description: Place an Earth Ally that grants nearby allied Heroes 50 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing damage taken by 50%. Has 400 Health and lasts 10 seconds.  Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Earth Allies.

4.name: Air Ally
4.description: Place an Air Ally that gives allied Heroes 15% Spell Power, grants vision, and reveals a large area around it. Has 200 Health and lasts 10 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Air Allies.

7.name: Blinding Speed
7.description: Decreases Radiant Dash's cooldown by 2 seconds and increases the maximum number of charges by 1.

7.name: Heavenly Zeal
7.description: Increases Breath of Heaven's Movement Speed bonus to 30%.  Radiant Dashing to an ally increases the healing they receive from Breath of Heaven by 50% for 3.5 seconds.

7.name: Blazing Fists
7.description: Increase the duration of Deadly Reach by 100%.  Every 3rd Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Deadly Reach by 0.75 seconds.

10.name: Divine Palm
10.description: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1200 if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

10.name: Seven-Sided Strike
10.description: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 2 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

13.name: Quicksilver
13.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally gives Kharazim and the target 30% bonus Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

13.name: Sixth Sense
13.description: While Stunned or Rooted, gain 75 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks for 4 seconds, reducing their damage by 75%.

16.name: Cleansing Touch
16.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally makes them Unstoppable for 1 second.

16.name: Way of the Hundred Fists
16.description: Radiant Dashing to an enemy launches a rapid volley of 6 Basic Attacks dealing 45% damage each.

16.name: Echo of Heaven
16.description: Breath of Heaven heals 75% of its normal amount, but heals a second time 3 seconds later.

20.name: Peaceful Repose
20.description: Divine Palm's healing amount is increased by 75% and its cooldown is set to 5 seconds if the Hero does not die.

20.name: Fists of Legend
20.description: Gain 50% of the benefit from both level 1  talents that were not chosen.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

20.name: Epiphany
20.description: Activate to restore 33% of Kharazim's maximum Mana and refill 2 charges of Radiant Dash.
